title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: Workshop on Developing Online Music Ensemble Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Music theory and experience in guiding basic ensemble instruction
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Apply real-time audio synchronization technology through collaborative music production simulations in a VR environment.
Propose at least three strategies to encourage positive peer interactions when designing online ensemble classes based on experiential learning models.
Develop educational materials explaining the concept of musical citizenry in virtual spaces through meta-ensemble teaching modeling.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
